tests.test_best_15_optimisation¶

This page provides detailed documentation for the tests.test_best_15_optimisation script.

Module contents¶

Test Suite for best 15 optimisation, using unittest.

Classes in the source file:

  • Best15OptimizationTests(): Test class for best 15 optimization script.

class tests.test_best_15_optimisation.Best15OptimizationTests(methodName='runTest')¶

Test class for best 15 optimization script.

test_defender_position_constraints()¶

Here we check if the constraint for the number of defenders is satisfied.

test_forward_position_constraints()¶

Here we check if the constraint for the number of forwards is satisfied.

test_goalkeeper_position_constraints()¶

Here we check if the constraint for the number of goalkeepers is satisfied.

test_maximization_of_value()¶

Here we check whether the optimization aims to maximize the value.

test_midfield_position_constraints()¶

Here we check if the constraint for the number of midfielders is satisfied.

test_players_per_team_constraint()¶

Here we check if the constraints for the number of players per team are satisfied.

test_price_constraint_equal_to_100()¶

Here we check if the constraint for the total price of the 15 players selection is satisfied on the equal limit.

test_price_constraint_greater_than_100()¶

Here we check if the constraint for the total price of the 15 players selection is satisfied on the upper limit.
